channel.title: I run on 64 bit please help?
channel.description: i downloaded this server and everytime i run it just completety shuts off can someone make me a 64 play? this server only runs in a 32 bit :/ http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.msg3182266.html#msg3182266

item.title: I run on 64 bit please help?
item.dc:creator: @Killznodie Killznodie
item.description:
@Killznodie wrote:

64 bit Run.bat for source

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title EvolutionX RunServer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls

Run.bat For client

@echo off title Wowstarz "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui @exit

Read full topic
item.source: I run on 64 bit please help?

item.title: I run on 64 bit please help?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

auzziejarrod:

Have you got the latest JDK (Java Development Kit) & if you do and still not working try redownloading it again ok mate if still not working pm me exactly what happens and I should be able to help rep ++ for helping

You can’t use a 64 bit JDK for running and compiling your server, for some reason it just doesn’t work…

You will need to download a 32 bit JDK and re-set your paths for your run.bat and compiler.bat to work.

Your 32 bit JDK should be in Program Files (x86)

Read full topic
